body: Almost, but what she wants is not something so heroic. Ryousuke, the husband has been doing as he like so far, so he can't accept the fact that he had became woman and tried whatever he can, such as buying medications. His friends raped him, and he just tasted it first hand, hentai logic about girls would feel pleasure even when raped is not true. He still try to act tough, but already help some trauma from being helpless against men (like in the restaurant). When he thought he's fired (it's a construction company, so lots of muscle work), the company asks him to at least try and come back. That place got a misogynistic culture though, and lots of female are quitting. The next day, they raped her and threatened to leak the video if she doesn't come to work. At home, Chisato, the wife, look back at how she decide to feed him gender changing drug. She also had tested it to her boss at work. Continued consumption a year after the change would make it permanent.

Seems like husband cheated on his wife a lot and wife decided to give him gender change drug so that he could know the misery of woman who are used just as sex tool but atlast he understand that he was wrong.
